description.zh: Postiz 是一个开源的 AI 社交媒体排期工具，旨在帮助用户管理帖子、建立受众、获取潜在客户并推动业务增长。它支持多个平台，包括 X（推特）、Instagram、YouTube、TikTok、LinkedIn、Discord 等。Postiz 提供托管和自托管版本，确保平台合规性和数据隐私。
description.en: Postiz is an open-source, AI-powered social media scheduling tool designed to help users manage posts, build audiences, capture leads, and grow their businesses. It supports multiple platforms including X (Twitter), Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, LinkedIn, Discord, and more. Postiz offers both hosted and self-hosted versions with full compliance and data privacy.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 使用 AGPL-3.0 许可证开源，透明且可定制
- 支持自托管，保障数据隐私与控制权
- 兼容多个社交平台，便于统一管理

## 功能列表:

- 跨平台社交媒体帖子排期
- 提供数据分析以衡量表现
- 团队协作功能，支持评论和共享排期
- 公共 API 及与 N8N、Make.com、NodeJS SDK 的集成
- 遵循平台规范的 OAuth 认证机制
- 基于 AI 的内容排期功能
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Open-source with AGPL-3.0 license for transparency and customization
- Self-hosted option ensures data privacy and control
- Supports a wide range of social platforms for comprehensive management

## Features:

- Schedule social media posts across multiple platforms
- Analytics to measure performance
- Team collaboration with commenting and shared scheduling
- Public API and integration with tools like N8N, Make.com, and NodeJS SDK
- Platform-compliant OAuth authentication
- AI-powered features for content scheduling
